title: Open infrastructure for peer-to-peer ridesharing
p1: The protocol connects riders and drivers without taking high fees from each fare. Each region's needs are met by a network of fleets. These fleets are digital co-operatives owned by their drivers. Drivers earn ownership over their respective fleets as they drive. Fleets compete on prices, fees, and service quality within their regions.
p2: The incentives we are building into the protocol will lead to a better deal for both riders and drivers. We're launching in Latin American cities this Summer. Join our driver waitlist below!
